extendedInfo.description: Optimise your credit repayment to suit your financial needs.It consists of common credit card interest calculator to help manage your personal finance.Managing and planning your credit card repayment has never been easier with this simple and trilingual App that effortlessly calculates total repayment, interest, overall interest rate, pay-off period, tenure and many more based on 4 different repayment modes:1. Pay the minimum repayment amount for every term until   full settlementâ¨2. Pay a fixed amount for every term until full settlementâ¨3. Pay above minimum repayment â Newly added4. Plan for the payoff period, and calculate how much to pay for every term until full settlementâ¨This mobile app can tabulate your repayment detail as well as visualize the repayment with graph, thereby providing insights in your repayment.You can also use it to compare and contrast the result of 2 different repayment strategies.Developed for ease of use, change of setting for default interest rate and repayment conditions is an absolute breeze! It is designed to be multilingual, allowing you to set its user interface to your preferred language of English, Chinese or Malay.

reviews.title: decent app
reviews.comment: I couldnt figure out how to do 2 different cards on here. That would have made this a great app. Its easy to use.
reviews.author: Angelica Jacobs

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: So I\'ve dl\'d this app n never used it. An update occurred n I decided to check it out. It will not open n forces restart. Maybe when this is fixed I\'ll update my review
reviews.author: Chantel McEldowney

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Worked well. I find it very useful.
reviews.author: Bong Posong

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Freaking awesome app.! Must have if you have credit cards!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Thanks. This helped me tremendously when i needed. Hopefully i won\'t need it in the near future.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wants 5% payment
reviews.comment: My loan only wants me to pay 1% per month. Your program could not deal with it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Looks great but it doesnt work at all samsung galaxy ace
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Give me a clear figure of how much interest paid & period to pay off & difference of 2 payment method. Graph in new version now is even better :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome. The summary is very useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
reviews.comment: App is set up to calculate 5% minimum pymt. Not only is that not what my min pymt is, but the app doesn\'t even tell me the exact dollar amt they are using for min pymt. That does NOT help me with my budget at all. I had to leave the app and use a calculator to figure out what dollar amt the app was using. Not helpful at all since I still had to use a calculator and perform multiple steps. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: single card usd only
reviews.comment: only supports one card, no currency choice, no dual currency ability..
reviews.author: A Google User
